media

Interface Decoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecoderXuggle

    public interface Decoder
    Interface for media decoder. The decoder should open a music video container to read packets and timestamps The interface decouples and all types have been made generic, using the adapter pattern, for use in other frameworks
    Author:
    Tony

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AudioSamples getAudioSamples()
      Get the audio samples associated with a particular audio packet
      long getAudioTimeStamp()
      Gets the audio time stamp at the current postition decoded
      String getFormattedAudioTimestamp()
      Gets the audio time stamp at the current postition decoded, but formatted in human readable hrs, mins, secs, millis
      String getFormattedVideoTimestamp()
      Gets the video time stamp at the current postition decoded, but formatted in human readable hrs, mins, secs, millis
      BufferedImage getVideoFrame()
      Gets the video frame associated with part of a series of video packets
      long getVideoTimeStamp()
      Gets the video time stamp at the current position decoded
      boolean hasNextPacket()
      Returns true if the stream being read has another packet to be decoded
      void makeResampler(int outputWidth, int outputHeight)
      Create a new resampler to change the pixel type of an image
      void readAudio(Packet packet)
      reads an audio packet from a container
      void readVideo(Packet packet)
      reads a video packet from a container

      • getAudioSamples

        AudioSamples getAudioSamples()
        Get the audio samples associated with a particular audio packet
        Returns:
        the audio samples from the packer

      • getVideoFrame

        BufferedImage getVideoFrame()
        Gets the video frame associated with part of a series of video packets
        Returns:
        a buffered image of the video frame

      • getVideoTimeStamp

        long getVideoTimeStamp()
        Gets the video time stamp at the current position decoded
        Returns:
        the video timestamp

      • getFormattedVideoTimestamp

        String getFormattedVideoTimestamp()
        Gets the video time stamp at the current postition decoded, but formatted in human readable hrs, mins, secs, millis
        Returns:
        a string representing the current timestamp in human-readable form

      • getAudioTimeStamp

        long getAudioTimeStamp()
        Gets the audio time stamp at the current postition decoded
        Returns:
        the currentaudio timestamp

      • getFormattedAudioTimestamp

        String getFormattedAudioTimestamp()
        Gets the audio time stamp at the current postition decoded, but formatted in human readable hrs, mins, secs, millis
        Returns:
        a string representing the current audio timestamp in human-readable form

      • makeResampler

        void makeResampler(int outputWidth,
                 int outputHeight)
        Create a new resampler to change the pixel type of an image
        Parameters:
        outputWidth - the width the new image is to be
        outputHeight - the height the new image is to be

      • readVideo

        void readVideo(Packet packet)
               throws RuntimeException
        reads a video packet from a container
        Parameters:
        packet - the video packet
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the packet cannot be read

      • readAudio

        void readAudio(Packet packet)
               throws RuntimeException
        reads an audio packet from a container
        Parameters:
        packet - the audio packet
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the packet cannot be read

      • hasNextPacket

        boolean hasNextPacket()
                      throws RuntimeException
        Returns true if the stream being read has another packet to be decoded
        Returns:
        true if there are more packets, false otherwise
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the status of the next packet cannot be ascertained
